meanings.sent1: I will start desanding the beach to make it safe for walking.
meanings.sent2: The workers are desanding the playground to keep it clean for the children.
meanings.sent3: After desanding the sandbox, the kids can play without getting sandy shoes.
meanings.sent4: Desanding the driveway felt like uncovering a hidden treasure beneath the sand.
meanings.sent5: The process of desanding the seashells made them shine like new.

meanings.definition: The act of removing sand from something.
meanings.sent1: The desanding of the construction site was necessary before building could begin.
meanings.sent2: A desanding machine was used to clean the sand from the collected seashells.
meanings.sent3: The desanding of the hourglass was a mesmerizing sight as the sand flowed out.
meanings.sent4: The desanding of the beach revealed a hidden layer of colorful pebbles beneath.
meanings.sent5: The desanding process in the factory ensured the products were free from any sand particles.
